title: 怎么样禁用Builder权限组如下几个权限?
author: HazySnowDay
txt_content:
1.Back权限
2.Tpa系列权限(tpa，tpahere)
3.彩色字体权限

replies.author: 背着书包丶
replies.txt_content:
打开plugins\GroupManager\globalgroups.yml
查找 essentials_builder
以下就是builder的权限，你那个就是
  - essentials.back
  - essentials.msg.color
  - essentials.chat.color
  - essentials.tpa
  - essentials.tpaccept
  - essentials.tpahere
  - essentials.tpdeny复制代码
把这些删除

replies.author: 超平坦之王
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder -essentials.back
/mangaddp builder -essentials.tpa
/mangaddp builder -essentials.tpahere
/mangaddp builder -essentials.chat.color

彩色应该是这个。。。
